name: Our Little Solid State
description:
six short, pillowy songs telling the story of a computer that watches itself be forced to reset.

all compositions produced, arranged, and mastered by mixandmash.

tools used

  • FL Studio 12 
  • FL Studio 20 
  • 0CC Famitracker
  • Audacity
  • Serum

sounds are from

  • earthbound
  • mother 3
  • mario party ds 
  • earthworm jim ds 
  • drawn to life
  • pokemon emerald / ruby / sapphire
  • diddy kong racing
